title: Inbolt provides vision guidance in real time for new bin-picking system
description:
Inbolt said its new guidance system on robot arms enables flexible, fast, accurate, and low-cost bin picking for unstructured environments.

The post Inbolt provides vision guidance in real time for new bin-picking system appeared first on The Robot Report.
